data.name: Home Dogs: The World Heroes
data.detailed_description:
Home Dogs: The World Heroes is a 12 player third person wave based shooter where the goal is to see how long you and your homies can survive. Visit places from all over the world from America to Japan as you try to resolve world conflicts and achieve peace the only possible way, with guns.

Features

    •12 player co-op
    •20 playable characters with more to come
    Maps based on real world locations
    A Wide variety of weapons

Still not sold? Just listen to what these homies have to say.
"This is a game for real kings" - liam

"Finally a game I can play with all my friends at once" - Simeon

"Now I don't need to tell you guys that this is a complete asset filled waste that claims to be a 12 player call of duty zombies inspired game but is nothing more then just a troll, I mean the clues in the name" - Slope's Game Room

data.short_description: Join William and the Home Dogs in this 12 player PVE game. Become the heroes the world needs by resolving world conflicts with sheer force as you gun down all opposition in pursuit to achieve world peace.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
